2008940.name: RalphGame Demo
2008940.description:
3 Gas tanks, 2 mackerels, and an onion..

That's all you have to do to beat the demo. It shouldn't take more than 30 seconds anyways

Features:

‣ Hundreds of unique items to collect, sell, detonate, and equip..

‣ Use grapple hooks, a skateboard ramp, or your skills to move around at break-neck speed..

‣ Dance battle a guru to earn the dance champ trophy..

‣ Drink 15 consecutive beers and enjoy temporarily enhanced combat at the cost of your vision..

‣ Collect birds that cost too much and do nothing..

‣ Escape a python's belly through the.. uh..

‣ Collect inflatable dancing tube men

‣ drink 15 more consecutive beers..

Join the discord on the right side of the Steam page :D
2008940.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
